name: undoctored
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is undoctored is in its original state or has not changed in order to deceive people: Before you book your hotel take a look at the website, which shows undoctored photographs of resorts and rooms next to the official version. They refused to publish the full, undoctored version of one critical report.
More examplesFewer examplesAs a photographer, he sought to capture the undoctored beauty of the natural world.She hoped that submitting the undoctored image would move the inquiry closer to the truth.They have released the full, undoctored, 90-minute session as a fundraising album.
